name: Natalia Lafourcade
description:
'''María Natalia Lafourcade Silva''' ({{IPA|es|maˈɾi.a naˈtalja lafuɾˈkade ˈsilba}}; born 26 February 1984) is a Mexican singer and songwriter who performs in genres such as [[pop rock]], [[jazz]], and [[folk music]]. Since her debut in 2002,{{efn|Video description says Lafourcade debuted in 2002}} she has been one of the most influential singers in Latin America and the United States. Lafourcade's voice has been categorized as a [[lyric soprano]].

Her accolades include the [[Latin Grammy Award records|most]] [[Latin Grammy Awards]] for a female artist (18), four [[Grammy Awards]], a [[Billboard Latin Music Awards|''Billboard'' Latin Music Award]] and three [[MTV Video Music Awards Latin America]].
